attributes.action: sack every MP (of all parties if other leaders agree) who has made a questionable expenses claim.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We as a nation DO NOT ACCEPT "I made a mistake" or "I'll pay it back". Expenses should be claimed for necessary items and regardless of guidelines which state a maximum amount.

A new flatscreen TV is not a requirement of being an MP, neither is a clean moat.

If your constituents are worried about mortgage payments perhaps you should clean your own home like the rest of us.

This action is the only way parliament can start to rebuild the trust of the British public.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
